name: Rail Duet
description:
The newest addiction comes in 3D!
Rail Duet is a new one-hand addictive game with an infinity of levels to complete and spectacular color themes.

Rotate the balls with your finger while they are riding on rails! Destroy objects with a ball of the same color, be agile and ready for interesting turns that are waiting for you on the way.

【Features】
- Bright and colourful 3D graphics
- Fun and relaxing gameplay
- One finger control
- Different obstacles and experience every time
- Enjoy the game even without WiFi.

【How to play】
- Swipe to rotate the balls and destroy obstacles with the same color - clear your path to reach the goal.
- Level after level, the difficulty increases and the journey gets more complicated!

Rail Duet is the most addictive and fun game! Travel by rail has never been so satisfying. Explore the path today!

What are you waiting for?
This hyper casual game keeps your attention for hours.
